topic.title: How to Include Topic Sections in TOC

body.p: To include topic sections in the table of contents, set the args.css.param.numbering-sections transformation parameter to yes. In this case, they are numbered according the numbering scheme set by the args.css.param.numbering parameter.
If you want to prevent topic sections from being numbered in your output, set the value of the args.css.param.numbering-sections parameter to no.
